metadata.title: Geography Quiz
metadata.description: Test your knowledge about countries, capitals, and landmarks
metadata.author: QuizMint

question.text: What is the capital of France?
question.feedback: Paris is the capital and most populous city of France.

question.text: What is the largest ocean on Earth?
question.feedback: The Pacific Ocean is the largest and deepest ocean on Earth, covering more than 30% of the planet's surface.

question.text: Which country is known as the Land of the Rising Sun?
question.feedback: Japan is known as the Land of the Rising Sun because from China, it appears that the sun rises from the direction of Japan.

question.text: Which is the longest river in the world?
question.feedback: The Nile River is generally considered the longest river in the world at about 6,650 kilometers (4,130 miles).

question.text: Which mountain range separates Europe from Asia?
question.feedback: The Ural Mountains are considered the geographical boundary between Europe and Asia.
